{"title": "Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 - Unlocked", "body_html": "

Display

The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 features a cutting-edge foldable Dynamic AMOLED display that delivers vivid colors, sharp resolution, and smooth refresh rates for an immersive viewing experience. The foldable design allows the device to transform between a compact pocket-sized form and a full-sized smartphone screen, ensuring both portability and versatility. The outer cover screen adds convenience, enabling quick access to notifications, widgets, and essential functions without unfolding the device.

Camera

The Galaxy Z Flip7 is equipped with a versatile dual-lens camera system that captures crisp, high-quality images in various lighting conditions. The main sensor produces detailed photos with balanced colors, while the ultra-wide lens broadens the perspective for scenic shots and group photos. The FlexCam feature takes advantage of the foldable design, allowing hands-free selfies, video calls, and creative angles with ease. Advanced software enhancements and AI optimization elevate both photography and video recording.

Operating System

Running on the latest Android platform with Samsung’s One UI interface, the Z Flip7 offers a refined, user-friendly experience. The software is optimized for foldable usage, delivering multitasking features such as split-screen functionality and app continuity, ensuring seamless transitions between the cover display and main screen. Customization options, security updates, and smart AI features enhance overall usability.

Connectivity

As an unlocked device, the Galaxy Z Flip7 is compatible with a wide range of carriers and network bands. It supports 5G connectivity for fast browsing and streaming, Wi-Fi 6 for stable wireless connections, and Bluetooth for quick pairing with accessories. NFC capabilities allow for smooth contactless payments, while GPS ensures accurate navigation on the go.

Performance

The Z Flip7 is powered by a flagship-level processor paired with advanced graphics and efficient cooling technology, providing outstanding performance for multitasking, gaming, and heavy applications. With optimized power efficiency and intelligent resource management, the device ensures smooth operation and responsive interactions even under demanding workloads.

Sound & Speaker

Equipped with high-quality stereo speakers, the Galaxy Z Flip7 delivers clear, balanced audio for both media playback and calls. With surround sound support and enhanced clarity, it provides an immersive audio experience, whether you’re watching movies, listening to music, or video conferencing. The microphone system ensures crisp voice quality for communication.

Storage

The device offers generous internal storage options to accommodate apps, media, and documents without limitations. Combined with ample RAM, it supports smooth multitasking and efficient background processing. While external storage expansion is not typically available on foldable devices, the onboard capacity is designed to meet modern storage needs with ease.

Note: This Phone is an international version model that comes with a 13-month Seller warranty and is shipped in a Generic Packaging Box with cable only.

{"title": "Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 5G Unlocked Smartphone", "body_html": "

Discover the future of mobile technology with the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7. Featuring a stunning foldable Dynamic AMOLED display, this unlocked smartphone delivers vibrant colors and a smooth 120Hz refresh rate. Its versatile dual-lens camera system with FlexCam allows for hands-free photos and creative angles. Running on the latest Android with Samsung's One UI, the Z Flip7 offers a seamless and intuitive user experience, optimized for its unique foldable design.

  • Display: 6.7-inch Foldable Dynamic AMOLED
  • Camera: 12MP Wide, 12MP Ultra-Wide
  • Operating System: Android with One UI
  • Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.3
", "tags": "samsung, galaxy z flip, foldable phone, unlocked, 5g, smartphone, android", "category": "Electronics > Communications > Telephony > Mobile Phones", "confidence": 0.95}

column1:
{"title": "Google Pixel 10 Pro XL - Unlocked", "body_html": "

Display

The Pixel 10 Pro XL has a 6.8-inch Super Actua OLED screen with an LTPO panel. The resolution is about 1,344 × 2,992 pixels. It supports an adaptive refresh rate from 1 Hz up to 120 Hz. Brightness peaks at roughly 3,300 nits, making it very visible outdoors. The display is wide, sharp, and smooth, especially for high-end use.

Camera

Rear camera system includes three lenses: a 50 MP main (wide) camera, a 48 MP ultra-wide, and a 48 MP telephoto lens with 5× optical zoom and up to 100× Pro Res Zoom in software mode. The front (selfie) camera is around 42 MP, with autofocus and a wide field of view (~103°). Video capabilities include very strong low-light performance, “Night Sight Video,” and more advanced stabilization.

Connectivity

The Pro XL model supports 5G, both physical SIM and eSIM (dual SIM dual standby). It has Wi-Fi, Bluetooth (recent versions), USB-C for data and charging, wireless charging support, and magnetic accessory compatibility via Pixel Snap / Qi2 standard. It is IP68 rated for protection against dust and water.

Operating System

It ships with Android 16, and Google promises 7 years of OS & security updates (new features & patches). There are also built-in Google AI tools (e.g. Magic Cue, Live Translate, etc.) and Pixel-specific features.

Performance

The phone runs on Google’s Tensor G5 chip, which uses modern fabrication (3nm) to improve efficiency and power. Compared to its predecessor, there are gains in average CPU speed (~34% faster) and improved TPU (for AI tasks). RAM in the XL version is typically 16 GB. For battery life: the XL model has one of the largest batteries in the series, with faster wired charging (≈ 45 W) and wireless charging support. In regular use you get over 24 hours; with the Extreme Battery Saver mode much more.

Storage

There are multiple storage variants: 256 GB, 512 GB, and 1 TB for the Pro XL model. The lower storage options (e.g. 128 GB) are not available for the XL in many markets. The storage standard is upgraded (e.g. UFS 4.0 / Zoned UFS in highest tiers) in some versions.

Sound & Speaker

It has stereo speakers for richer audio output. The sound quality is considered very good for media consumption. It also supports modern audio standards via Bluetooth (for wireless audio), and has the usual system of mics for noise reduction, voice capture, etc. Specific wattage or output decibels isn’t publicly large-(detailed) for UK spec, but it matches what you expect in a flagship. IP68 rating helps protect components.

Note: This Phone is an international version model that comes with a 13-month Seller warranty and is shipped in a Generic Packaging Box with cable only. Brand new item come with 1-year manufacturer warranty and original packaging.

Brand Google
Launch 20/Aug/2025
Body

{"title": "Google Pixel 10 Pro XL 5G Unlocked Smartphone", "body_html": "

Experience the power of Google AI with the Pixel 10 Pro XL. Its 6.8-inch Super Actua OLED display provides a brilliant and smooth viewing experience with an adaptive 120Hz refresh rate. The pro-grade triple camera system, featuring a 50MP main lens and 5x optical zoom, captures stunning photos and videos in any light. Powered by the Google Tensor G5 chip, the Pixel 10 Pro XL delivers intelligent performance and all-day battery life.

  • Display: 6.8-inch Super Actua OLED (1-120Hz)
  • Camera: 50MP Wide, 48MP Ultra-Wide, 48MP Telephoto (5x Optical Zoom)
  • Processor: Google Tensor G5
  • Operating System: Android with 7 years of updates
", "tags": "google pixel, pixel 10 pro, unlocked, 5g, smartphone, android, tensor", "category": "Electronics > Communications > Telephony > Mobile Phones", "confidence": 0.98}
